name: El Dieritch
description:
You are, a magical creature with a grudge against the rest of diekind. Roll with the punches and battle 'til you die by taking charge of your sides in this short puzzle RPG.

Instructions:

El Dieritch works by combining choice and chance. You're in control of which moves you pick and how effective they are, but the roll might have other ideas... choose your faces and roll to fight!

  Attack your foe   Defend from all damage

  Heal yourself

  Boosts attack and healing

Beware: Boost makes you stronger, but does nothing on its own!

Control using arrow keys and spacebar

Created in 48hrs for the #gmtkjam 2022

Theme: Roll of the Dice

Made by ChrisDeeBrown and meghan0n
